name: svelte-autoimport
description: Automatically finds, parses and provides code actions and code completion for all available imports. Works with Typescript, Javascript and svelte files

svelte-autoimport.filesToScan.description: Glob for files to watch and scan, e.g ./src/** ./src/app/**/*.ts. Defaults to **/*.{ts,tsx}

svelte-autoimport.showNotifications.description: Specifies wether to show notifications from Auto Import

svelte-autoimport.doubleQuotes.description: Specifies wether to use double quotes

svelte-autoimport.spaceBetweenBraces.description: Specifies wether to use spaces between first and last brace

svelte-autoimport.autoComplete.description: Adds found items to intellisense and automatically imports then

svelte-autoimport.useSemiColon.description: Use ; at the end of a line e.g Import * from ./app or Import * from ./app; - Default True

svelte-autoimport.importWithIntend.description: Script tag is indented (check this if imports are indented by one indentation level too little)
